Summary: bright white/blue light like a spotlight illuminating a cone-shaped cloud
divs: Sighting DetailsAround 7:45 p.m. Eastern Time I was alone in my backyard. There were no clouds; the sky was completely clear. I saw a light appear in the south. It was joined by a cone of light below it, the whole effect looking like a spotlight from a helicopter or a flashlight pointing down from above, shining through fog or smoke. The bright light lasted 10-15 seconds, finally flickering out and leaving just the cloud, which faded quickly. I went inside to get my wife and she noticed I was shaken up.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around September 19th 2009
